name: Golf Of The Dead
description:
In a apocalyptic town, lead your golfer to the safe zone across different golf fields full of zombies ready to get your brain,

shoot em, smash em and explode em as they dont surround you

This is our first ever Ludum Dare participation. We were two to make it  happen, me (the programer) and a graphist. We are quite proud of what we accomplished :)

For the theme, we decided to mix sports (golf) with a survival horror game

Use your mouse to move the ball (drag and release). Hit W to use one of the explosive ball (but you only got 3 of them by level) and Space to hit the zombies with your club !

Reach the Safe House before they reach you !
